member.name: T:RobotFramework.ExampleRemoteLibrary
member.summary: RobotFramework example of .NET Implementation of a remote library. Based on the Python example at http://robotframework.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/tools/remoteserver/example/examplelibrary.py Compile into an assembly DLL and pass filename and "RobotFramework.ExampleRemoteLibrary" as arguments to the .NET implementation of remote server to start the server with this library.

member.name: M:RobotFramework.ExampleRemoteLibrary.strings_should_be_equal(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Example keyword that validates 2 given strings match. Throws exception (as a way to fail) when strings don't match. Logs comparing of 2 strings to keyword output (standard output redirected).

member.name: M:RobotFramework.ExampleRemoteLibrary.count_items_in_directory(System.String)
member.summary: Example keyword that returns # of items in a given directory. Items include folders, subfolders, and files, etc.
member.param: Directory to get # of items for
member.returns: Number of items in the given directory
